CalWORKs Stage One Child Care Eligibilit.summary: CalWORKs Stage One Child Care provides subsidized care upon entering CalWORKs, with extended access under Senate Bill 80 since October 1, 2019.

Continuous Eligibility for Children (CEC.summary: Continuous Eligibility for Children (CEC) ensures children under 19 maintain free Medi-Cal eligibility until annual redetermination or age 19, disregarding adverse financial changes.

Every Woman Counts (EWC) Program.summary: The California Department of Health Care Services' Every Woman Counts Program provides free breast and cervical cancer screening services to uninsured women.

Programs of All-Inclusive Care for the E.summary: The PACE program provides comprehensive care to frail elderly individuals eligible for Medicare and Medicaid, enabling community living.
